botan.pubkey.algo.rsa

RSA

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

struct RSAPublicKey;
RSA Public Key

this(BigInt n, BigInt e);
Create a RSAPublicKey @arg n the modulus @arg e the exponent

struct RSAPrivateKey;
RSA Private Key

this(RandomNumberGenerator rng, BigInt p, BigInt q, BigInt e, BigInt d = 0, BigInt n = 0);
Construct a private key from the specified parameters.

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator
BigInt p the first prime
BigInt q the second prime
BigInt e the exponent
BigInt d if specified, this has to be d with exp * d = 1 mod (p - 1, q - 1). Leave it as 0 if you wish the constructor to calculate it.
BigInt n if specified, this must be n = p * q. Leave it as 0 if you wish to the constructor to calculate it.

this(RandomNumberGenerator rng, size_t bits, size_t exp = 65537);
Create a new private key with the specified bit length

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng the random number generator to use
size_t bits the desired bit length of the private key
size_t exp the public exponent to be used

class RSAPrivateOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Signature, botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Decryption;
RSA private (decrypt/sign) operation

class RSAPublicOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Verification, botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Encryption;
RSA public (encrypt/verify) operation
